mapper.sql: SELECT T1.ROW_ID as id /*记录编号*/ ,T1.CREATED as created /*创建时间*/ ,T1.CREATED_BY as createdBy /*创建者ID*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(t1.LAST_UPD, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS lastUpdated /*最后更新时间*/ ,T1.LAST_UPD_BY as lastUpdatedBy /*最后更新者ID*/ ,T1.CORP_ID as corpid /*公司账套*/ ,T1.ORG_ID as orgId /*组织ID*/ ,T1.POSTN_ID as postnId /*职位ID*/ ,T1.URL as url /*URL*/ ,T1.NAME as name /*名称*/ ,T1.COMMENTS as comments /*备注*/ ,T1.INSERT_FLAG as insertFlag /*添加*/ ,T1.DEL_FLAG as delFlag /*删除*/ ,T1.UPDATE_FLAG as updateFlag /*修改*/ ,T1.SELECT_FLAG as selectFlag /*查询*/ ,T1.DEF_ACCESS_FLAG as defaultAccessFlag /*默认可访问*/ ,T1.TYPE as type
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO LNK_URL_INFO( ROW_ID /*记录ID*/ ,URL /*URL*/ ,NAME /*名称*/ ,COMMENTS /*备注*/ ,INSERT_FLAG /*添加*/ ,DEL_FLAG /*删除*/ ,UPDATE_FLAG /*修改*/ ,SELECT_FLAG /*查询*/ ,DEF_ACCESS_FLAG /*默认可访问*/ ,TYPE ) values (
#{id} /*记录ID*/ ,#{url} /*URL*/ ,#{name} /*名称*/ ,#{comments} /*备注*/ ,#{insertFlag} /*添加*/ ,#{delFlag} /*删除*/ ,#{updateFlag} /*修改*/ ,#{selectFlag} /*查询*/ ,#{defaultAccessFlag}/*默认可访问*/ ,GET_LOV_val(#{usercorpid}, 'URL_TYPE', #{type}) )
mapper.update: UPDATE LNK_URL_INFO SET URL =#{url} /*URL*/ ,NAME =#{name} /*名称*/ ,COMMENTS =#{comments} /*备注*/ ,INSERT_FLAG =#{insertFlag} /*添加*/ ,DEL_FLAG =#{delFlag} /*删除*/ ,UPDATE_FLAG =#{updateFlag} /*修改*/ ,SELECT_FLAG =#{selectFlag} /*查询*/ ,DEF_ACCESS_FLAG =#{defaultAccessFlag}/*默认可访问*/ ,TYPE = GET_LOV_val(#{usercorpid}, 'URL_TYPE', #{type}) WHERE ROW_ID=#{id}
